comment:
Капеллан (именной НПЦ) в присутствии хотя бы одного сопротивленца отпевает тела сопротивленцев
Капеллан

languages.text: "Да смилуется Император над душами усопших сих, был ли путь их праведен или ложен".
"May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."
languages.original_text: "Да смилуется Император над душами усопших сих, был ли путь их праведен или ложен".

traits.locale_text: "May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."
"May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."
"May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."
"May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."
"May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."
"May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."

languages.text: “愿帝皇垂怜这些死者的灵魂，无论他们生前走的是正路还是邪路。”
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."

traits.locale_text: “愿帝皇垂怜这些死者的灵魂，无论他们生前走的是正路还是邪路。”

languages.text: 「彼らが辿ってきた道が正しくとも、間違っていようとも、死者の魂に皇帝の情けがありますように」
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らが辿ってきた道が正しくとも、間違っていようとも、死者の魂に皇帝の情けがありますように」

languages.text: «Que el Emperador se apiade de las almas de estos difuntos, tanto si siguieron el camino recto como si no».
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."

traits.locale_text: «Que el Emperador se apiade de las almas de estos difuntos, tanto si siguieron el camino recto como si no».

languages.text: "Möge der Imperator Gnade mit den Seelen der Verstorbenen haben, ob ihr Pfad nun rechtschaffen oder falsch war."
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."

traits.locale_text: "Möge der Imperator Gnade mit den Seelen der Verstorbenen haben, ob ihr Pfad nun rechtschaffen oder falsch war."

languages.text: « Que l'Empereur ait pitié des âmes de ces défunts, qu'importe la voie qu'ils avaient choisie. »
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."

traits.locale_text: « Que l'Empereur ait pitié des âmes de ces défunts, qu'importe la voie qu'ils avaient choisie. »

languages.text: "İmparator, gittikleri yol doğru da olsa yanlış da olsa ölenlerin ruhlarına merhamet etsin."
languages.original_text: "May the Emperor have mercy on the souls of these deceased, whether the path they followed was righteous or false."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator, ölenlerin ruhlarına merhamet etsin. Gittikleri yol doğru da olsa yanlış da olsa."
